author: Nam Tran
title: Professional program to recover WhatsApp info from iOS devices
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $19.95 Giveaway of the day — Tenorshare WhatsApp Recovery 3.2 Professional program to recover WhatsApp info from iOS devices User rating: 4 (44%) 5 (56%) 1 comment 
Tenorshare WhatsApp Recovery 3.2 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now Tenorshare WhatsApp Recovery 3.2 Terms and conditions 
Tenorshare WhatsApp Recovery is a professional program to recover WhatsApp Messages, WhatsApp Attachments, Contacts from iOS devices, including iPhone 7/7 Plus, SE, 6S/6S Plus, iPhone 6/6 Plus, iPhone 5S/5C/5, iPhone 4S, iPhone 4, new smaller iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad touch 6/5G with just one click. For iOS users, you can recover all lost WhatsApp data directly from iDevices or extract backup files from iTunes backup in the case if you have lost your iOS devices. This tool is also good at repairing Operating System when iPhone, iPad and iPod perform abnormally. System Requirements: 
Windows 10/ 8.1/ 8/ 7/ Vista/ XP (32-bit/64-bit); CPU: 1GHz (32 bit or 64 bit) or above; Free Hard Disk Space: 55.5 MB free space and above Publisher:
